instruction: Compose a song using only these two words
output:
Verse 1:
Stars shining in the night,
Feeling so alive.
Twinkling in the sky, 
Makes me feel so high.

Chorus:
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let their light make everything alright.
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let the beauty of the night ignite.

Verse 2:
Stars in the night,
The darkness so inviting.
The stars up high,
Makes me reach for the sky.

Chorus:
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let their light make everything alright.
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let the beauty of the night ignite.

Bridge:
Let the stars bring light and hope,
Let them light up the darkest night.
Let the stars bring light and hope,
Let their beauty soothe the fight.

Chorus:
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let their light make everything alright.
Stars in the night, Stars in the night.
Let the beauty of the night ignite.
